mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch_employee( branch_employee_code, local_category_code, shop_code, position_category_code, branch_employee_id, branch_employee_name, branch_employee_birth, branch_employee_phone, branch_employee_address, branch_employee_cetificate ) VALUES ( #{branchEmployeeCode}, #{localCategoryCode}, #{shopCode}, #{positionCategoryCode}, #{branchEmployeeId}, #{branchEmployeeName}, #{branchEmployeeBirth}, #{branchEmployeePhone}, #{branchEmployeeAddress}, #{branchEmployeeCetificate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT branch_employee.branch_employee_code, branch_employee.branch_employee_id, branch_employee.branch_employee_name, branch_employee.branch_employee_birth, branch_employee.local_category_code, branch_employee.shop_code, shop.shop_name
FROM branch_employee INNER JOIN shop ON branch_employee.local_category_code = shop.local_category_code AND branch_employee.shop_code = shop.shop_code WHERE position_category_code = '201' ORDER BY branch_employee_code asc

SELECT branch_employee.branch_employee_code, branch_employee.branch_employee_id, branch_employee.branch_employee_name, branch_employee.branch_employee_birth, branch_employee.branch_employee_phone, branch_employee.branch_employee_address, branch_employee.branch_employee_cetificate, branch_manager.branch_manager_worknum, branch_manager.branch_manager_start, branch_manager.branch_manager_bank, branch_manager.branch_manager_banknum, shop.shop_name
FROM branch_employee INNER JOIN shop ON branch_employee.local_category_code = shop.local_category_code AND branch_employee.shop_code = shop.shop_code INNER JOIN branch_manager ON branch_employee.branch_employee_code = branch_manager.branch_employee_code WHERE branch_manager.branch_employee_code = #{branchEmployeeCode}
